verbose_text: While Pax6 expression extends into the Gsx2 + dLGE territory at E10.5, resulting in the co-expression of these two transcription factors in the dLGE, we found that at E12.5, Pax6 and Gsx2 expression domains directly abutted one another at the PSPB; Pax6 was expressed at high levels throughout the pallium, including in the ventral pallium, whereas Gsx2 was expressed exclusively in the LGE and MGE, including in the dLGE (XREF_FIG A, D-D '' ').
